metadata.synopsis: Dialog for the guard in the Baldurs Mouth office for if you are caught trying to sneak down to the basement.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Try and go down the stairs on the ground floor of the Baldurs Mouth building

0.speaker: Guard Unilda Tiro
0.text: Oi, citizen - stop right there. Basement's off-limits 'cept to Mr Needle.
